name: Where No Light Will Follow
description:
Where No Light Will Follow

In Where No Light Will Follow, the player arrives at a mysterious cabin after receiving an unknown phone call. The voice on the phone promised answers...and offered help. Upon arrival, the player finds this cabin abandoned and the surrounding area devoid of life. Explore the forest to find clues and uncover the true reason you were called to this cryptic place.

In this suspense puzzler game, navigate between areas of light to find journal entries, solve puzzles, and explore new locations. If left out in the dark for too long, the player’s sanity begins to deplete. When the sanity meter reaches zero, the player returns to their previous checkpoint and resumes. Use matches to create a temporary field of light to boost sanity when light sources are few.

Made for GAME 290, Spring 2022
